name: Summer Friends Don't Stick Around
description:
Summer Friends Don't Stick Around is a "forever-time" multiplayer game. 

The goal of this game's creation was to immortalize players and give others a chance to play with them "in spirit" even after they are no longer with us. 

In the "Remember Me" mode, players can train a neural network to capture their play style. The output is a data model that can be shared with friends and family. Your playstyle is essentially encoded in the data model.

In the "Remember Them" mode, players can load a data model file and play with them..

Developer note (v1.0): I'm still learning more about neural networks and tweaking them to capture more of how any particular player approaches the game. There is room for improvement. I've encountered a bug where sometimes the saved model doesn't chase the rabbit. In that case, I recommend playing Remember Me mode again to give it another chance

Credits:Ambient Wave 48 (Tribute) by Eroika, a sound created as a tribute to the creator's friend who passed (Freesound - 496757)

City Park Ambiance by Felix.Blume (Freesound - 667060)
